list.item:
Problem #1
Pneumonia (onset July 3, 2013; resolution Aug 14, 2013) [authored Aug 14, 2013]
Implanted Devices: Upper GI Prosthesis, January 3, 2013

act.text: Possible flu-like symptoms for three days.

tr.td: Normal range for women is 12.0 to 15.5 grams per deciliter

code.displayName: CBC W Auto Differential panel in Blood

list.item: Appointments: Schedule an appointment with Dr Seven after 1 week. Follow up with Outpatient facility.
In case of fever, take Tylenol as advised in plan of treatment.
